fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.plot(l, l * (l + 1) * sample_power_shape(l, scale=scale) / (2.0 * np.pi),
    label='Original')
for i in range(3):
    noise_map = corr_noise_gen.fromConvPower(sample_power_shape, seed=i,
        scale=scale)
    ell, Pl = noise_map.powerSpectrum(l)
    ax.plot(ell, ell * (ell + 1) * Pl / (2.0 * np.pi), label=
        'Realization {0}'.format(i + 1), linestyle='--')
ax.set_xlabel('$l$')
ax.set_ylabel('$l(l+1)P_l/2\\pi$')
ax.legend(loc='lower right')
ax.set_yscale('log')
plt.savefig('correlated_power.png')
plt.clf()
